name: SD Gundam Generation: Ichinen Sensouki
overview: SD Gundam Generation: Ichinen Sensouki ("SD Gundam Generation: One Year War") is a turn-based strategy game for the Super Famicom. It is based on the One Year War arc of the original Mobile Suit Gundam series, also known as Mobile Suit Gundam 0079. It is the first of six SD Gundam Generation games released for the Sufami Turbo peripheral, which uses smaller carts that are able to communicate with each other when placed in the Sufami Turbo device.
